element.short: active | unconfirmed | confirmed | inactive | resolved | refuted | entered-in-error
element.definition: Assertion about certainty associated with the propensity, or potential risk, of a reaction to the identified Substance.
element.comments: Decision support would typically raise alerts for 'Unconfirmed', 'Confirmed', and 'Resolved' and ignore a 'Refuted' reaction. In particular, 'Refuted' may be useful for reconciliation of the Adverse Reaction List. Some implementations may choose to make this field mandatory.
